problem.markdown:
>>1. The maximum energy that can be stored safely in a capacitor is limited by<< ( ) the breakdown voltage ( ) width of dielectric (x) both breakdown voltage and width of dielectric
>>2) The dielectric used in high value capacitors is<< (x) mica ( ) ceramic ( ) paper
>>3) A capacitor with the following text on its body: 105K has a capacitance of<< ( ) 1 milli F ( ) 1 pico F (x) 1 micro F
>>4) Which of the following best describes the time constant in an RC (resistor - capacitor) circuit?<< (x) Time for the charge stored in the capacitor to drop to 37% of its original value. ( ) Time for 37% of the initial charge to leave the capacitor. ( ) Time for the capacitor to completely discharge.
>>5) Between the plates of an air capacitor if a glass slab is inserted without moving the plate then<< ( ) Its capacitance is hardly affected (x) Its capacitance is increased ( ) Its capacitance is decreased

choicegroup.label: 1. The maximum energy that can be stored safely in a capacitor is limited by
choicegroup.choice: both breakdown voltage and width of dielectric
